scripts.test: npm run fixture && node -r dotenv/config script/test.js
scripts.build: rm -rf static && cp -r ../static/dist static && docker image build -t shelf-admin:latest .
scripts.tag: docker image tag shelf-admin:latest `npm run -s image`
scripts.deploy: gcloud run deploy shelf-admin --image `npm run -s image` --platform managed --region asia-northeast1
scripts.staging: npm run activate && npm run build && npm run tag && npm run push && npm run deploy
